word_mean: 铜绿：蓝色含水碱性醋酸铜，为收敛药，(CH3·COO)2·Cu·Cu(OH)2

sentence.Network_en: His pockets are full of red lead and verdigris.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的衣袋里装满铅丹和铜绿.

sentence.Network_en: Verdigris has spread all over that abandoned copper pot.
sentence.Network_cn: 那把已经废弃的铜壶上长满了铜锈.

sentence.Network_en: The latter has neither hens nor chicks, and only thinks of himself and perspires verdigris.
sentence.Network_cn: 那风信公鸡既没有母鸡,也没有小鸡.他只想着自己,满身铜绿!

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French verte-gres, earlier vert de Grece 'green of Greece'

entry.def: Verdigris is a greenish-blue substance that forms on the metals copper, brass, and bronze after they have been left in wet or damp conditions.

means.word_mean: 1. a blue or green powder used as a paint pigment
2. a green patina that forms on copper or brass or bronze that has been exposed to the air or water for long periods of time

auth_sentence.content: On the inside, two veins the color of verdigris were visible.
